message.content:
I need to identify the total income from ordinary activities and extract its value along with its constituent sub-items.

Looking at the income statement, the line item that represents total income from ordinary activities would be "Total Revenue" with a value of 28572608.70.

For the sub-items, I need to identify components that make up this total revenue. The statement shows "Main Business Revenue" with the same value of 28572608.70, which is the only sub-item contributing to the total revenue.

Therefore:
- The value of total income (Total Revenue) is 28572608.70
- The sub-item is Main Business Revenue with a value of 28572608.70

```json
{"solution": {'value': '28572608.70', 'sub_items': {'sub_item value': '28572608.70'}} }
```
